text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the HIDevolution ASUS ROG G703GX 17.3" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, RTX 2080, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 512GB SSD + 1TB SSHD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch.
